meanings.sent1: The antilynching activists organized peaceful protests against violence.
meanings.sent2: She always spoke out against lynching, showing her antilynching beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The antilynching group held educational workshops to spread awareness.
meanings.sent4: His antilynching stance was as strong as a fortress, unwavering in the face of injustice.
meanings.sent5: The community united in their antilynching efforts, standing firm against hatred.

meanings.definition: A person or group that works to prevent or stop lynching.
meanings.sent1: The antilynching was praised for their dedication to justice and equality.
meanings.sent2: She joined the antilynching organization to make a difference in her community.
meanings.sent3: The antilynching group held a bake sale to raise funds for their cause.
meanings.sent4: He was a true antilynching, always ready to stand up for what is right.
meanings.sent5: The antilynching group's impact was felt far and wide, bringing hope to many.
